Firstly, you'll want to discuss your concerns with your doctor, who should be on alert for symptoms of autonomic neuropathy. You'll want to mention if you've experienced any other abnormalities (such as any other sexual difficulties). He or she can formally diagnose the issue and prescribe medication based on your symptoms that may reverse the current damage and prevent more from occurring. You may feel uncomfortable discussing the issue, but it's important to know if you need treatment. Simultaneously, you might also try to reduce your stress level and see if you can regain the stronger sensation that way.
